Posts.Content: On May 31, 2014 2:46 AM Alberta66 wrote: Has any one had a skin rash since taking arimidex (anastrozole) 1 mg daily e.g. itchy raise patches on abdomen, groin, chest, eyelids, and areas under eyes?  The itching is intense at night.  I have been checked my MD and dermatologist this is not scabies.   Finally had biopsy of one of the patches.  The resuts showed the histopathologic findings are consistent with the clinical impression of a reaction to a medication.  The pathology (lab report) cannot name the drug.  That will take me getting over the terrible skin erruptions and possible trying the Arimidex again.  Was wondering if any one else has had a similiar reaction.I've got the skin rash as well. It started after 2 yrs on Anastrozole and quite itchy at times. It's affecting my groin area, inner thighs, my rectal area, under my breasts and incredibly my inner jaw area. The doctors are denying a possible side effect to the med. I've had a biopsy and was assured it was not cancerous but no one seems to know what to do with it. Hoping to get a resolution soon .
Posts.Title: Arimidix (anastrozole) skin side effects?
